brand_identity.name: EcoIndus Solutions
brand_identity.tagline: Turning Industrial Liability into Sustainable Asset

HeroSection.visual_style: Split layout or Immersive Background. Left: Strong Typography + CTA. Right: Abstract Engineering Visual or High-Quality Industry Photo.
HeroSection.interaction: Parallax scroll effect on background image. Staggered text entrance.
HeroSection.content_guidelines: Headline must be punchy (e.g., 'Decarbonize Profitably'). Subhead lists credentials (UFMS, Masters).

ServicesBento.visual_style: Bento Grid layout using Tailwind. Cards have 'Technical' borders (1px solid border-border/60). Hover state: border-primary/50 and slight lift.

CarbonCalculatorModal.visual_style: Glassmorphism. Clean sliders for 'Current Waste', 'Energy Usage'. Visual output: 'Trees Saved' or 'Carbon Credits Earned'.
CarbonCalculatorModal.interaction: Real-time updates as sliders move. Smooth transitions.

ProjectGallery.visual_style: Asymmetrical masonry. Images have zoom-on-hover. Overlay text appears on hover with project stats.

ConsultationForm.visual_style: Minimalist, single column. Focus on 'Schedule Visit'. Date picker (Calendar) is prominent.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on all solid backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.08) for cards. 1px solid rgba(26,60,52, 0.1) for primary containers.
visual_enhancers.corner_radius: rounded-none or rounded-sm for an 'Industrial/Precision' feel. Max rounded-md.

motion.entrance: framer-motion: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, ease: 'easeOut' }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Light Mode' first aesthetic. Use the Pine Green (#1A3C34) as the primary text/brand color, not just a button color.
For the 'Services' section, DO NOT use a standard 3-column grid. Use the 'Bento Grid' layout defined in layout_strategy.
The 'Carbon Calculator' MUST be a modal (Dialog) triggered from a CTA, not an on-page form.
Use 'Syne' font for all Headings (h1, h2, h3) and 'Manrope' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
Ensure the 'Contact' section prioritizes 'Schedule a Visit' over 'Send Message'.
Use the provided image URLs strictly. Do not use placeholders.
For the 'About' section, highlight the 'UFMS Masters in Energy Efficiency' credential prominently.
Make sure the 'Plastic Recycling' service highlights the 'Logistics to Production Line' full-cycle capability.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
